input.title: Gmeek.yml - GitHub Actionså·¥ä½œæµ
input.content:
name: build gmeek
on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  issues:
    types: [opened, edited]
  issue_comment:
    types: [created, edited]
  push:
    branches:
      - main
    paths:
      - config.json

permissions:
  contents: write
  pages: write
  id-token: write

concurrency:
  group: "pages"
  cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:
  build:
    name: Generate blog
    runs-on: ubuntu-20.04
    if: ${{ github.event.repository.owner.id == github.event.sender.id || github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch' }}
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Generate new html
        uses: Meekdai/Gmeek@main
        with:
          options: --issue --rss --sitemap

      - name: Setup Pages
        uses: actions/configure-pages@v3

      - name: Upload artifact
        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v2
        with:
          path: './docs'

  deploy:
    name: Deploy blog
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build
    steps:
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v2
